alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:07PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of Frontier County through 645 PM CDT... At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms with gusty winds extending from 7 miles west of Stockville to 9 miles north of Indianola. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Eustis, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
